Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Chronic CYP administration significantly ( P < or = . 002 ) increased bladder weight by 60 % and increased ( 7 - to 11 - fold ) the numbers of NOS - immunoreactive ( IR ) afferent neurons in the L6 - S1 DRG .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| CYP |
| NOS |

Explanation:

* "CYP" is an abbreviation for "cytotoxic effect," which is not a disease entity in itself, but rather a effect of a toxic substance on cells.
* "NOS" stands for "nitric oxide synthase," which is an enzyme involved in the production of nitric oxide, a signaling molecule in the body. In this context, "NOS-immunoreactive" refers to the presence of nitric oxide synthase in the neurons.

So, the only valid disease entity in the paragraph is "CYP."

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid disease entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| CYP |

Explanation:

* "CYP" is an abbreviation for "cytotoxic effect," which refers to the toxic effects of a substance on cells.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
